q: The political climate, however, has made it difficult. Some Democrats have criticized plans to cut Social Security benefits as secret plots to destroy the program. Many Republicans have refused to consider tax increases. We need to get past the politics of the past and deal with this issue, making the hard decisions that have to be made, Sen.
